content.rendered:
CXP086/2024

Criteria:

  • NQF Level 4, Full Status FFC or Bachelor’s degree in Real Estate, Business
    Administration, Marketing, or related field preferred.
  • Licensed Real Estate Agent with a minimum of 3-5 years of experience in
    residential or commercial real estate sales.
  • In-depth knowledge of local real estate market trends, property values, and
    neighborhood.
  • Proficiency in real estate software and tools, including MLS platforms, CRM
    systems, and marketing software
  • Results-oriented mindset, Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Valid driver’s license and access to a reliable vehicle

Apply via website or apply via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
